reviews.text: Great hotel and excellent wellness area, the hamam is simply superb!
reviews.title: Faboulus hotel

reviews.text: I am used to the wonderful wellness hotels in Austria and being Swiss, wanted to check this one out as it would be much easier for me to reach it. Alas, it did not come up to my expectations from the wellness point-of-view (wellness area too small, few facilities on offer). The room in the new part of the building, while quite large and fairly cozy, has many disappointing features. Whatever did the interior designer think? When you want a shower and have the lights on, you have to draw the curtains if you do not want the opposite neighbour to see you. The bathtub is the most dangerous that I have ever come across - you slide right down in the water and there is no handrail. The shaving mirror is a joke and you cannot read in the chair as it has no armrests. In summary, the room is full of cute little gadgets but it is not at all functional. A lot of love has gone into it but the result is annoying.
reviews.title: Very kind staff

reviews.text: On the positive side, the staff are charming and efficient, the manageress ever-present and most helpful, the food is good and the breakfast is just about the best I have ever come across. The lobby is cozy, the various restaurants lovely. Location right in the centre of the village, access by car ok once it has been explained to you. It must be a good place for a skiing holiday but do stay clear of the bathtub!
reviews.title: Hip Hotel for business

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Looks like I had to go back to Austria for my and my wife's wellness week.
reviews.title: Awesome SpA in a great hotel

reviews.text: I was staying here on business, but I wonder why. It was quite a trip to get from the airport, but I guess the facilities were ok. My room really impressive (with carved wood on the walls) - but only in the new bit of the hotel. My colleagues stayed in the old part and the rooms were really average. I loved the feel of the hotel, it was very hip. But I dont know whether I would choose to go there with my husband - I think there are other hotels more suitable for couples.
